metadata.title: CVE-2024-38391 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:cxl/region: Fix cxlr_pmem leaks Before this error path, cxlr_pmem pointedto a kzalloc() memory, free it to avoid this memory leaking.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
